full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,KHYAB PA SGO BRGYAD RAB GSAL KUN DGA' NOR BU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013A *, ,(CES KHYAB PA SGO BRGYAD RAB GSAL KUN DGA' NOR BU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SNGA SOR BAndI TA BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN NYI MA DANG DGE BSHES MGON PO GNYIS KYIS BSKUL BA DANG, PHYIS SU 'ANG KHU RE CHEN MOR SLOB MA RNAMS LA BSTAN PAS BDAG CAG LA BSTAN PA LTAR YI GER BRIS DGOS CES BSKUL NGOR ^BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI THO'ANG TSE RING MKHYEN RAB BO,, ,,)
